SQLDataSource.Author: DELL
SQLDataSource.Name: Revenue_by_work_type
SQLDataSource.Where: task_seq IN (SELECT task_seq FROM (SELECT a.sales_line_seq, &AO.Service_Pricing_API.Get_Sales_Price_Amount_Rounded(a.sales_part_site, a.sales_part_no, a.qty_to_invoice, a.sales_price, a.discount, a.currency_code, a.revenue_percent) as SALES_PRICE_AMOUNT_CURR, &AO.Jt_Task_Sales_Line_API.Get_Task_Seq(a.sales_line_seq) as task_seq, &AO.Active_Separate_API.Get_Reg_Date(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Wo_No(&AO.Jt_Task_Sales_Line_API.Get_Task_Seq(a.sales_line_seq))) as reg_date, &AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Work_Type_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_Sales_Line_API.Get_Task_Seq(a.sales_line_seq)) as work_type_id, &AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_Sales_Line_API.Get_Task_Seq(a.sales_line_seq)) as contract_id, &AO.Crm_Cust_Info_API.Get_Main_Representative_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Customer_No(&AO.Jt_Task_Sales_Line_API.Get_Task_Seq(a.sales_line_seq))) as main_rep FROM &AO.jt_task_sales_line a WHERE &AO.Sc_Service_Contract_API.Get_Contract_Type(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_Sales_Line_API.Get_Task_Seq(a.sales_line_seq))) = 'MS' AND &AO.Jt_Task_Sales_Line_API.Get_State(a.sales_line_seq) = 'Invoiceable' AND &AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Work_Type_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_Sales_Line_API.Get_Task_Seq(a.sales_line_seq)) IS NOT NULL) WHERE reg_date >= TO_DATE(NVL('$BEGIN_DATE$', '01/01/1900'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND reg_date <= TO_DATE(NVL('$END_DATE$', '31/12/2999') || ' 11:59:59 PM', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss pm') AND REPLACE(NVL(contract_id, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$CONTRACT_ID$', ' '), ' ', '%') AND REPLACE(NVL(main_rep, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$REGION_REPRESENTATIVE$', ' '), ' ', '%'))
